Introduction

APPLE.B was a five-member South Korean girl group under GH Entertainment. The group made their offical debut in August 2017 with the digital single "Woochuchu".

In 2018, following the departure of Sandy and Hyunmin, the group announced their disbandment after just a year of promotions. Then later in 2019, the three remaining members, Yuji, Yurim, and Haeun regrouped and debuted as the trio 3YE.
